name: Moondiver
description:
Welcome to Extreme Moondiving, the sickest sport this side of the solar system!

Stay airborn as long as you can to earn mad cash that you can use for upgrades. Keep your speed below 4.0 before landing or you'll die and lose a chunk of your reward money!

Get enough upgrades and you might find something wicked! (Hint: Don't listen to it.)

Controls (default): 

- Arrow keys: Move left and right, select upgrades.

- Z: Use jetpack, purchase upgrades.

- X (in upgrade screen): Return to game screen.

(IMPORTANT) The game currently does not save progress. You should be able to complete the game in one sitting.
